channel.title: [317] Paradox317,Friendly community,Many customs,All SKILLS WORK ALL 25![vps]
channel.description:
Important! We are a Farley new server We are vps hosted and have freidnly community and staff we treat each other like family. 1.)Customs items variety of choices on what could be yours :) 2.)Custom home and teleports 3.)Custom shops 4.)all skills work even dung and summoning! :d 5.)We have almost daily updates 6.) Custom citys with there own features :) 7.)Max level is 125 in all skills and able to prestiage :) 8.)Donaters have there own home and benefits :) 9.)have custom bosses :) 10.)Friendly owner and active ever day 11.) We put players ahead of us ever day and do what we can do to help one another 12.)A new pking system 13.)old school based :) 14.)CUSTOM comands for certain ranks 15.)MANY MANY MANY more come check it out and you will see :) 16.)downlaodable cleint and full screen :)
Things we are in progress in 1.)Adding bank tabs we almost there 2.) every skill you prestiage you get a beneift from it alot more but come join the paradox xommunity and will see :)
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uRXoi-nqkoY[/youtube]
Downloadble client :) https://www.dropbox.com/s/bioq5xhotsu1rv7/paradox317.jar
Fourms http://paradox317.forum-pro.co.uk/

item.description:
@doneil wrote:

                               Important!

We are a Farley new server We are vps hosted and have freidnly community and staff we treat each other like family.
1.)Customs items variety of choices on what could be yours
2.)Custom home and teleports
3.)Custom shops
4.)all skills work even dung and summoning! :d
5.)We have almost daily updates
6.) Custom citys with there own features
7.)Max level is 125 in all skills and able to prestiage
8.)Donaters have there own home and benefits
9.)have custom bosses
10.)Friendly owner and active ever day
11.) We put players ahead of us ever day and do what we can do to help one another
12.)A new pking system
13.)old school based
14.)CUSTOM comands for certain ranks
15.)MANY MANY MANY more come check it out and you will see
16.)downlaodable cleint and full screen

Things we are in progress in
1.)Adding bank tabs we almost there
2.) every skill you prestiage you get a beneift from it
alot more but come join the paradox xommunity and will see
